name: Clumsy dwarves
description:
YOLO GameJam

You control a bunch of dwarfs that want to move as many goods from a factory to a warehouse as possible. In order to do that they need to keep the factory up and running by maintaining the power plants nearby. 

But beware! The dwarfs are clumsy and they only get to live once. 

Have fun!

Credits: Tomáš Jakubec, Tomáš Plhák, Jáchym Žák, Jiří Resler
